snippet: Self magazine plans to introduce an online game named for its Workout in the Park, an event the magazine has hosted for 19 years.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; Self magazine, in an effort to remain relevant in a world of new media and social media, plans to introduce an online game named for its Workout in the Park, an event the magazine has hosted for 19 years; game, aimed at women, will be based on the annual event, adding interactive elements; effort is part of a growing trend of legacy media rethinking ways to seek revenue from advertisers and consumers.
lead_paragraph: Self magazine plans to introduce an online game named for its Workout in the Park, an event the magazine has hosted for 19 years.

headline.seo: Self Magazine Creates Social Game for Its Annual Workout in the Park
headline.main: Taking a Page From the Web, Magazine Pitches a Social Game
headline.print_headline: A Magazine Takes a Page From the Web And Puts Its Pitch Into a Social Game
